snippet.title: Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: Get another look at the colorful world, farming gameplay, and more from Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop in this trailer for the upcoming cozy farming game. In Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop, take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade the island and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the island with life again. Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop will be available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch in 2024.
